object.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1209 (1576 with comment) chars
o=screen q=math I=input O=table.insert b=I.getNumber m=q.sin k=q.cos function Y(a,d,_)return{a=a,d=d,_=_}end function ag(v,A)return{a=v.a+A.a,d=v.d+A.d,_=v._+A._}end function N(r)return r*q.pi*2 end function X(L,D,J)local l,h=k(L),m(L)local t,p=k(D),m(D)local n,j=k(J),m(J)return{{t*n,h*p*n-l*j,l*p*n+h*j},{t*j,h*p*j+l*n,l*p*j-h*n},{-p,h*t,l*t}}end function ac(B,y)return R(function(f)return B[f][1]*y.a+B[f][2]*y.d+B[f][3]*y._ end)end function R(u)return{a=u(1),d=u(2),_=u(3)}end s=0 E=150 H=.75 i={}g={}w=1 function onTick()local i={}g=T()w=b(28)for f=0,7 do local z=f*4 if I.getBool(f+1)then local M=b(z+1)local K=N(b(z+2))local F=N(b(z+3))local e=M*k(F)local x=Y(e*m(K),M*m(F),e*k(K))local S=g:V(x)O(i,{c=S,r=s})end end local G={}for U,e in ipairs(i)do if e.r+E<s then O(G,e)end end i=G s=s+1 end function T()local c={a=b(4),d=b(8),_=b(12)}local aa,ab,ad=b(16),b(20),b(24)local C=X(aa,ab,ad)return{c=c,C=C,V=function(P,x)return ag(ac(P.C,x),P.c)end}end function onDraw()local ae,W=o.getWidth(),o.getHeight()o.drawMap(g.c.a,g.c._,w)for U,e in pairs(i)do local af,Q=map.mapToScreen(g.c.a,g.c._,w,ae,W,e.c.a,e.c._)local Z=q.min(1-((ah.r/E)-H)/(1-H),1)o.setColor(255,0,255,Z*255)o.drawRectF(af,Q,1,1)end end

c1.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1209 (1576 with comment) chars
o=screen q=math I=input O=table.insert b=I.getNumber m=q.sin k=q.cos function Y(a,d,_)return{a=a,d=d,_=_}end function ag(v,A)return{a=v.a+A.a,d=v.d+A.d,_=v._+A._}end function N(r)return r*q.pi*2 end function X(L,D,J)local l,h=k(L),m(L)local t,p=k(D),m(D)local n,j=k(J),m(J)return{{t*n,h*p*n-l*j,l*p*n+h*j},{t*j,h*p*j+l*n,l*p*j-h*n},{-p,h*t,l*t}}end function ac(B,y)return R(function(f)return B[f][1]*y.a+B[f][2]*y.d+B[f][3]*y._ end)end function R(u)return{a=u(1),d=u(2),_=u(3)}end s=0 E=150 H=.75 i={}g={}w=1 function onTick()local i={}g=T()w=b(28)for f=0,7 do local z=f*4 if I.getBool(f+1)then local M=b(z+1)local K=N(b(z+2))local F=N(b(z+3))local e=M*k(F)local x=Y(e*m(K),M*m(F),e*k(K))local S=g:V(x)O(i,{c=S,r=s})end end local G={}for U,e in ipairs(i)do if e.r+E<s then O(G,e)end end i=G s=s+1 end function T()local c={a=b(4),d=b(8),_=b(12)}local aa,ab,ad=b(16),b(20),b(24)local C=X(aa,ab,ad)return{c=c,C=C,V=function(P,x)return ag(ac(P.C,x),P.c)end}end function onDraw()local ae,W=o.getWidth(),o.getHeight()o.drawMap(g.c.a,g.c._,w)for U,e in pairs(i)do local af,Q=map.mapToScreen(g.c.a,g.c._,w,ae,W,e.c.a,e.c._)local Z=q.min(1-((ah.r/E)-H)/(1-H),1)o.setColor(255,0,255,Z*255)o.drawRectF(af,Q,1,1)end end
